text: The Road to 'Saturn' () is a 1967 Soviet action movie directed by Villen Azarov.80 лет Валентине Талызиной: Екатерина II и пани ДульскаяПУТЬ В «САТУРН» It stars Mikhail Volkov, Georgi Zhzhyonov, and Arkadi Tolbuzin. == Actors == * Mikhail Volkov as Krylov / Kramer * Georgi Zhzhyonov as Timerin * Arkadi Tolbuzin as Drobot * Yevgeny Kuznetsov as Simakov * Leonid Chubarov * Vladimir Ferapontov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian movies Category:1967 action movies Category:Movies directed by Villen Azarov Category:Russian action movies
title: The Road to 'Saturn'
